summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 FORD FUSION. WHILE THE CONTACT'S DAUGHTER WAS DRIVING 25 MPH, THE POWER STEERING AND ADVANCETRAC INDICATORS ILLUMINATED. AFTER PARKING, EXITING, AND RETURNING TO THE VEHICLE, THE STEERING WHEEL SEIZED AS THE CONTACT ATTEMPTED TO DRIVE. THE STEERING WHEEL EVENTUALLY RETURNED TO NORMAL, BUT WAS EXTREMELY DIFFICULT TO TURN. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO AN INDEPENDENT MECHANIC WHO DIAGNOSED THAT THE POWER STEERING FAILED. THE CONTACT DID NOT KNOW WHICH COMPONENT HAD FAILED. THE INDEPENDENT MECHANIC DECLINED TO SERVICE THE VEHICLE AND THE CONTACT MADE AN APPOINTMENT WITH ELKINS FORDLAND (696 BEVERLY PIKE, ELKINS, WV 26241) AND WAS AWAITING REPAIR. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 80,000.
